phptagsfunctions-preg-bad-delimiter: The error message. Valid delimiters are `~!@#$%^&*-_+=.,?"':;|/<([{
phptagsfunctions-preg-no-ending-delimite: The error message, Parameters: * $1 - expected delimiter character. any one of the following characters: `~!@#$%^&*-_+=.,?"':;|/>)]}
phptagsfunctions-preg-unknown-modifier:
The error message, Parameters:
* $1 - modifier. Valid modifiers are: i, m, s, x, A, D, U
